lines.text:
[singing]
He's a flash, he's a marvel, he's a masterpiece of circuitry/He's the best, he's the greatest from the Megastellar Company

[singing]
More than bionic, he's more than a toy!/More than a robot, he's a man-made boy!/Ain't no robot like Romie-0, oh no!

[singing]
Oh yeah, oh yeah?/Well, we've got a brain child! She never forgets/Yes, she's a brain child, she's your key to success

[singing]
She's everything you dreamed of, custom-made

[singing]
And you were made for each other/You and Julie-8

[singing]
Ain't no robot like Romie-0/Megastellar, specially-made!

[singing]
And you were made for each other...
